content:
https://www.uea.ac.uk/course/phd-doctorate/formalising-aspects-of-the-langlands-program-in-lean-birkbeckc-u23sciec

I'm happy to announce that the department of mathematics at the University of East Anglia will be funding a PhD position in number theory and formalisation starting in 2023. It will be supervised by me and Shaun Stevens. The application deadline is the 27th of November (2022).
Feel free to message me directly with any questions!

I once again have funding for a PhD student looking to work in number theory and formalisation, starting in Oct. 2024. The project will be supervised by me and Shaun Stevens and the application deadline is 2023-11-27T23:59:00Z . Further details, including funding information are here. To apply you can also use this link.
Feel free to message me directly for more information or if you have any questions.
